changeSet.author: home
changeSet.sql: create table student ( id int auto_increment, surname varchar(50), name varchar(40), patronymic varchar(45), studying_group varchar(30), date_of_birth date, constraint student_pk primary key (id) ); insert into student (surname, name, patronymic, studying_group, date_of_birth) values ('Ivanov', 'Ivan', 'Ivanovich','050504','2000-1-23'), ('Jameson', 'Kevin', '','050503','2001-2-14'), ('Bond', 'James', '','050501','2002-12-3'), ('Clinton', 'Bill', '','050505','2000-8-9'), ('Jonson', 'Boris', '','050506','2020-4-12'), ('Petrov', 'Petr', 'Petrovich','050504','1999-4-12');
